titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii 12 Julii 1648 whereas divers debenters signed by the Committee of Lords and Commons for the Army have by some ill disposed persons been counterfeited and put to sale at low rates to the scandall of the Parliament and great prejudice of the souldiery ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
